mapper.select: SELECT task.*, user.username as publisherName, user.email as publisherEmail, user.phone_num as publisherPhone FROM task JOIN class_task r ON task.id = r.task_id JOIN user ON task.publisher_id = user.id WHERE r.class_id = #{classId}

SELECT task.*, user.username as publisherName, user.email as publisherEmail, user.phone_num as publisherPhone FROM task JOIN (SELECT task_id FROM accept WHERE user_id = #{userId}) as TaskId ON task.id = TaskId.task_id JOIN user ON task.publisher_id = user.id;

SELECT task.*, user1.username as publisherName, user1.email as publisherEmail, user1.phone_num as publisherPhone, G.name as groupName, G.group_leader groupLeader, G.process groupProcess, G.group_id groupId, G.file file, user2.username as leaderName, user2.email as leaderEmail, user2.phone_num as leaderPhone FROM task JOIN (SELECT * FROM v_group as g RIGHT JOIN (SELECT group_id FROM in_group as r WHERE r.user_id = #{userId}) as GroupId ON g.id = GroupID.group_id ) as G ON task.id = G.task_id JOIN user user1 ON task.publisher_id = user1.id LEFT JOIN user user2 ON G.group_leader = user2.id;
SELECT task.*, user.username publisherName, user.email publisherEmail, user.phone_num publisherPhone FROM task LEFT JOIN user ON task.publisher_id = user.id WHERE task.id = #{taskId}
